destiny.core

Class FadeImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • destiny.core.FadeImage

  • public class FadeImage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses the PImage class from processing and adds fading capability to it
    Version:
    12/5/2020
    Author:
    Nathaniel
